column4: These are the two problems: 1) The voip software X-lite gives me error when I want to login, the error is "Discovered Port Restricted Cone NAT Firewall". I am sitting behind the wireless router (D-Link) but the same software was working in windows with same location (of my laptop). 2) The microphone of my system is not working in skype or any other software in ubuntu 9.04. Please solve these two problems, I am just new to ubuntu and I liked

These are the two problems: 1) The voip software X-lite gives me error when I want to login, the error is "Discovered Port Restricted Cone NAT Firewall". I am sitting behind the wireless router (D-Link) but the same software was working in windows with same location (of my laptop). 2) The microphone of my system is not working in skype or any other software in ubuntu 9.04. Please solve these two problems, I am just new to ubuntu and I liked
can somebody solve my problem in private ?
more people may be able to help if you keep it in the public channel
what port is your voip software trying to use? did you open that port on your firewall?
how can I check it ? I am new to ubuntu (linux)
or netcat to that port from outside.
I am not getting you actually I am new here in linux and don't know much about shell scripting
this link will be helpful I think, but how can I do what it says with my router ?

I have found the link on my D-Link router, it shows me how to do the port forwarding to the internal IP address. But I guess when ever I am connected to the network of my room, I will be assigned a new IP. So how can I fix that IP ? may be by giving static IP ?
ok let me give it a try
a static ip will also require some reconfiguration of your ubuntu setup
can you help me changing the configuration to static iP ?
there are some private and public ports in the map fields ... what public port should I give?
